brand.name: TechFlow Solutions
brand.description: A modern software consultancy specializing in AI-powered business solutions and digital transformation.
brand.oneLineDescription: Transforming businesses through intelligent software solutions
brand.audienceSummary: Tech-savvy business owners, CTOs, and decision-makers at mid-size companies looking to modernize their operations
brand.valueProp: We turn complex business challenges into elegant software solutions that drive growth and efficiency
brand.imageStyleNote: Clean, modern, tech-focused imagery with blue and white color scheme. Prefer abstract tech illustrations, office environments, and professional team photos.
